title: WellboreMarkerWorkProductComponent
description: Wellbore Markers identify the depth in a wellbore, measured below a reference elevation, at which a person or an automated process identifies a noteworthy observation, which is usually a change in the rock that intersects that wellbore. Formation Marker data includes attributes/properties that put these depths in context. Formation Markers are sometimes known as picks or formation tops.

ResourceTypeID.description: The SRN of the resource's resource type.

ResourceID.description: The SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object at the version level.

ResourceHomeRegionID.description: The name of the home [cloud environment] region for this OSDU resource object.

ResourceHostRegionIDs.description: The name of the host [cloud environment] region(s) for this OSDU resource object.

ResourceObjectCreationDateTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which Version 1 of this OSDU resource object was originated.

ResourceVersionCreationDateTime.description: Timestamp of the time when the current version of this resource entered the OSDU.

ResourceCurationStatus.description: Describes the current Curation status. Possible values - CREATED, CURATING, CURATED.

ResourceLifecycleStatus.description: Describes the current Resource Lifecycle status. Possible values - LOADING, RECEIVED, ACCEPTED, RESCINDED, DELETED,

ResourceSecurityClassification.description: Classifies the security level of the resources. Possible values = RESTRICTED, CLASSIFIED, CONFIDENTIAL, MOST-CONFIDENTIAL

items.description: The SRN which identifies this OSDU File resource.

RoleID.description: The SRN of this artefact's role.

ResourceTypeID.description: The SRN of the artefact's resource type.

ResourceID.description: The SRN which identifies this OSDU Artefact resource.

DepthUnit.description: Unit of Measure of the Depth

VerticalMeasurementID.description: References an entry in the Vertical Measurement array for the Wellbore identified by WellboreID, which defines the vertical reference datum for all marker measured depths of the wellbore marker Markers array.

MarkerMeasuredDepth.description: The depth at which the Marker was noted.

MarkerDate.description: Timestamp of the date and time when the when the Marker was interpreted.

MarkerObservationNumber.description: Any observation number that distinguishes a Marker observation from others with same Marker name, date.

MarkerInterpreter.description: The name of the Marker interpreter (could be a person or vendor).

MarkerTypeID.description: Marker Type Reference Type. Possible values - Biostratigraphy, Lithostratigraphy, seismic, depth of well, sequence, flow unit

FeatureTypeID.description: Feature Type Reference Type. Possible values - Base, top, fault, salt, reef, sea floor

FeatureName.description: Name of the feature the marker is characterizing

PositiveVerticalDelta.description: The distance vertically above the Marker position that marks the limit of the high confidence range for the Marker pick.

NegativeVerticalDelta.description: The distance vertically below the Marker position that marks the limit of the high confidence range for the Marker pick.

SurfaceDipAngle.description: Dip angle for the Wellbore Marker.

SurfaceDipAzimuth.description: Dip azimuth for the Wellbore Marker.
